presentation.title: Enjoy a relaxing stay in Sierras Chicas
presentation.text: A few blocks from the Cordoba Golf Club, between Villa Allende Shopping and the city centre, you will find this rustic-style retreat. Our air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms offer comfort and tranquillity. With options for small groups or families, you will enjoy a delicious breakfast and access to the swimming pool with barbecue. Our strategic location puts you close to points of interest while you immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the area. Book now and find a home away from home in Villa Allende.
